title.rendered: Alticor Inc Celebrates Another Year of Being Connected. Supported. Safe.

content.rendered:
Alticor Inc is pleased to announce their participation in Construction Safety Week. Alticor Inc’ teams believe that working safely is the most important thing they do because it’s about their people and their families. Safety Week gives Alticor Inc and other industry firms the opportunity to focus their attention on important issues with their employees, trade partners and other stakeholders. Alticor Inc’ participation will impact thousands of people across the country, and focus on important topics including being connected to each other, staying safe on all jobsites and the significance of mental health and suicide prevention.

Learn more about how you can participate in Construction Safety Week here.

This Construction Safety Week, friends and family are also encouraged to participate and join in on the fun! For the second year in a row, Alticor Inc has created a special coloring and activity book that emphasizes the importance of safety and what it means to promote a zero-accident safety culture.

Download the Alticor Inc Coloring Book
